post.description:
Converts Markdown formatted text to HTML for display purposes.
The input is validated to ensure it contains safe Markdown content.
post.summary: Convert Markdown to HTML
tags:
Markdown

API endpoints for Markdown processing and conversion

post.description:
Converts HTML content to Markdown format with controlled tag support.
Only allowed HTML tags will be processed, others will be stripped.
post.summary: Convert HTML to Markdown
tags:
Markdown

API endpoints for Markdown processing and conversion

post.description: Validates Markdown content without converting it, useful for form validation.
post.summary: Validate Markdown content
tags:
Markdown

API endpoints for Markdown processing and conversion

post.description:
Generates an HTML preview of Markdown content for display purposes.
This is essentially the same as markdownToHtml but with a different semantic meaning.
post.summary: Preview Markdown content
tags:
Markdown

API endpoints for Markdown processing and conversion

post.description:
Analyzes content to determine if it appears to contain Markdown formatting.
Useful for automatic detection of content type.
post.summary: Check if content is Markdown
tags:
Markdown

API endpoints for Markdown processing and conversion

get.description: Returns the list of HTML tags that are supported for HTML-to-Markdown conversion.
get.summary: Get allowed HTML tags
tags:
Markdown

get.summary:
Get all visible projects.
The project becomes "visible" when all conditions are matched:
- is_enabled is true
- is_launched is true
- current date >= launch_date
